Entries.1443/f theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 15: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 24 0 theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 4 19 2/skippable/viewport 8 18 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -5 3/pause 250/emote theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 16/faceDirection theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 1 true/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "Hello, @!"/move theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 2 0 1/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "I finished up a new brew, just for you!$h#$b#So, I'd like you to try it out.$h#$b#Come over here.$h"/move theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley -3 0 1 false/move farmer -4 0 2/pause 500/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "Go ahead, take a sip!$h#$b#I promise it's not dangerous."/pause 250/question fork1 "#Try the brew#Deny the brew"/fork ashdeny/friendship theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 50/pause 500/farmerEat 184/pause 4000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/emote theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 28/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "Of course. It doesn't work.$s"/faceDirection farmer 0/move theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 0 -1 0/move theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 4 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "The wizard tells me I need to 'adapt', but...#$b#It's hard.$s"/move theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 0 1 2/pause 250/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "Without Red, I'm practically an entirely different person now.$s"/faceDirection theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 3/pause 1000/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "But, I can live without him if I have to.$s#$b#Maybe you could be my assistant one day.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 2/pause 1000/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "Well, thanks for coming by today.$h#$b#I should be getting back to my work now."/end
Entries.ashdeny: friendship theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley -1000/emote theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley 12/speak theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley "I make a brew just for you and you won't even try it?$a#$b#Whatever. I'm just going to go back to working on my own brews.$a"/end

Entries.theduda.ashleymodremake_Ashley: Thanks! I needed this!$h/64 336/Thanks. I could use this.$h/-28 420 257 281 107 305 247/What purpose do you expect this to serve for me?$s/80 348 346 303 -74/This is a waste of my time. I'm in the middle of something./390 388 330 571 568 569/Um... thanks?$u//

Entries.Wizard: Oh, did you want to speak to Ashley? She didn't want to come.#$b#She's busy working on her brews in the tower.
